articles.description: Bangladesh play the Netherlands in the Men's T20 World Cup in Saint Vincent - follow text updates, in-play video highlights and radio commentary.
articles.title: Bangladesh v Netherlands LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 - cricket score, commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: Follow live text updates from day one of the US Open at Pinehurst in North Carolina.
articles.title: US Open LIVE round one: Woods, Koepka, Fitzpatrick and Rose out early at Pinehurst

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Conor Gallagher says he is only "focusing on England" at Euro 2024 amid reports of a potential summer departure away from his boyhood club.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Conor Gallagher only 'focusing on England' not Chelsea future

articles.description: American Patrick Cantlay leads by one from Sweden's Ludvig Aberg midway through the opening round at Pinehurst's Number Two course.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Patrick Cantlay leads from Ludvig Aberg as Tiger Woods grinds

articles.description: Rafael Nadal will play in a clay-court tournament in Sweden rather than on the grass Wimbledon this summer.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal to miss Wimbledon to focus on Paris Olympics

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund part company with manager Edin Terzic after he asks the club "to terminate his contract with immediate effect".
articles.title: Edin Terzic: Borussia Dortmund part company with manager

articles.description: Italian club AC Milan appoint Paulo Fonseca as their new manager on a three-year deal.
articles.title: AC Milan: Former Lille boss Paulo Fonseca appointed new manager of Milan

articles.description: Tyson Fury says he is "relishing" the chance to secure redemption against Oleksandr Usyk in their rematch in December.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk: Briton 'back in the gym' for rematch

articles.description: England defender John Stones resumes training after spending Wednesday isolated in his hotel room with a sickness bug.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England's John Stones returns to training after illness

articles.description: Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown help the Boston Celtics hold off a Dallas Mavericks fightback to take a 3-0 lead in the NBA finals.
articles.title: NBA Finals: Jayson Tatum stars as Boston Celtics go 3-0 up against Dallas Mavericks
